ygData.subject: A little from me...
ygData.msgSnippet: Expect the servers to be very unstable for at least a day, sometimes takes a week to get the servers to stay up more than a few hours after a launch day...
ygData.messageBody:
"Expect the servers to be very unstable for at least a day, sometimes takes
a week to get the servers to stay up more than a few hours after a launch
day..."

That would explain why I was repeatedly disconnected last night. It was
getting extremely annoying. It didn't even occur to me that not only were
the servers unstable after the new expansion, but that there were probably a
million people playing with their new Froglok characters.

Speaking of Frogloks, I have seen many that were already in their 20s, and
it was the first day. I can only imagine how long those people have been
playing yesterday... probably hours and hours on end. It's amazing that they
don't have anything to do on a Monday of all days.

I do not have the expansion yet. I might have mentioned this, but I am
unfortunately using dial up, and the download would have taken more than 6
hours. Therefore, I am waiting until the expansion hits stores in a week or
so and purchasing it that way. I can't wait to use the new features, such as
the map. That was an excellent idea and will definitely make traveling much
easier.

On another note, does anyone know anything about the new creatures that you
may purchase for riding, such as a horse? Are they more expensive than
horses? I have wanted a horse for the longest time, but I'm afraid it's
tough to make money... especially being a caster. When grouped, the melee
types loot the corpses before I can get to them usually.

That's all from me for now. Take care everyone and enjoy the new expansion!

-= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-
